gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Celtics 145, Clippers 108
gameRecap.excerpt: The Celtics defeated the Clippers, 145-108. Jayson Tatum recorded 30 points, 5 rebounds, and 2 assists for the Celtics, with Jaylen Brown (24 points, 6 rebounds) and Derrick White (18 points, 3 blocks) combining for 42 points in the victory. Paul George tallied 21 points and 3 rebounds for the Clippers in the losing effort. The Celtics improve to 22-6 in the regular season, while the Clippers fall to 17-12.
